author: AJ Willingham, CNN
title: 5 things to know for April 8: Coronavirus, White House, health, Navy, stimulus bill
description: Here's what you need to know to Get Up to Speed and Out the Door.
content: (CNN)A tiny bit of optimism: Public health officials now say the US death toll from coronavirus could be much lower than predicted, thanks to (most) everyone's scrupulous social distancing. Here's what else you need to know to Get Up to Speed and On with Your… [+5171 chars]
